tool.name: chewBBACA PrepExternalSchema
tool.description: Adapt an external schema to be used with chewBBACA
tool.command: mkdir './schema' && unzip '$input_schema' -d './schema' && chewBBACA.py PrepExternalSchema #if str($training_file) != 'None' --ptf '$training_file' #end if #if str($genes_list) != 'None' --gl '$genes_list' #end if @INPUT@ $size_filter -g './schema/schema_seed/' -o './schema_seed' && zip -r PExternalschema_seed.zip './schema_seed'

param.name: input_schema
param.label: Schema Files in zip format
param.help: The schema directory contains the loci FASTA files and a folder named 'short' that contains the FASTA files with the loci representative alleles.

param.label: Size filter
param.help: Apply the minimum length and size threshold values to filter out alleles during schema adaptation

tool.help:
chewBBACA is a software suite for the creation and evaluation of core genome and whole genome MultiLocus Sequence Typing (cg/wgMLST) schemas and results.
The PrepExternalSchema module enables the adaptation of external schemas so that it is possible to use those schemas with chewBBACA.
